庢字的基本解释

庢
zhì
阻碍；制止。。

庢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhì］
［《廣韻》陟栗切，入質，知。］
(1)阻碍。
(2)同“厔”。水曲折处。

庢字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【广字部】　庢； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页345第20
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?陟栗切，音窒。【說文】礙止也。【枚乗七發】發怒庢沓。【註】言初發怒，礙止而涌沸。　又【廣韻】縣名。在京兆。【寰宇記】山曲曰盩，水曲曰庢。○按《前漢·地理志》作厔。

考證：〔【寰宇記】山曲曰盭，水曲曰庢。〕　謹照原文盭改盩。
庢字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
庢字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [Guangzi Department] 　庢; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 345 No. 20
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Zhi Li cut, sound choked. [Said the text] Obstacles. 【Meicheng Seven Hair】Get angry. [Note] I was angry at the beginning of the speech, but it was boiled to stop it.　[Guangyun] The name of the county. In Jingzhao. [Huanyu Ji] The mountain song is called 盩, and the water song is called 庢. ○According to the "Pre-Han Geography History" as a well. Textual research: [【Huanyu Ji】The mountain song is called Yu, and the water song is called Yu. 〕 　I would like to change the original text to 盭盩.
